meaningMnemonic: You need to go up on the <radical>roof</radical> and <radical>slide</radical> down <radical>seven</radical> times to make this your <kanji>house</kanji>. A house isn't a <kanji>home</kanji> until you've slid down it exactly seven times, you know.
readingMnemonic: If you try to slide down your new <kanji>house</kanji> and you land on a <reading>tack</reading> (たく), that means the house has rejected you. It isn't your home now. You need to leave and find a new home.
